description:
A good network is the passport to a great job.

If you don't have a professional network, there's a real danger you'll spend months applying to faceless application forms while your better connected friends get job opportunities falling into their lap!

Just as bad and just as common - when you're lucky enough to have some existing connections, but you don't really know how to use these to your advantage.

Networking like a pro is an ESSENTIAL skill in today's job market.

In our course, entrepreneur and soft skills guru Rommell Wallace walks you through how he became a master networker – and the simple steps YOU can take to do the same.

By the end of the course, you will:

  • be able to make and grab networking opportunities, wherever they are
  • always be well prepared, confident and ultra professional
  • know how to take the pain out of the job search process, by developing a professional network that will help you go further, faster

Networking Your Future is a complete, 360 degree introduction to the world of professional networking.

We'll cover, together, how start building a professional network that can be a powerful springboard to your career.

First we'll cover how to be prepared – the crucial steps to take to make sure YOU can benefit from networking opportunities at any time.

Then we'll look at the skill of networking itself – from how to present yourself in person, to 21st century networking using various online tools.

Lastly, we'll focus on how to develop your network over the long term, building and nurturing ongoing, highly valuable professional relationships.

Start learning now – and grab all the networking knowledge Rommell has learned in his professional career in just half an hour!
title: Networking Your Future
